main event: Observers reported seeing eight round objects in the sky while fishing on Shoshone Lake in Yellowstone Park.
interesting points: The objects were about 20 feet in diameter and appeared to be shiny like bright aluminum., The observers were drawn to the sight by a sound resembling duck wings., The objects were flying at an estimated altitude of 800 to 1000 feet., The sighting lasted a brief period, and the objects moved in a manner reminiscent of blackbirds., The observer speculated that the objects were controlled by a device and may belong to the United States Government.
witness description: a couple fishing from a rubber boat on the lake
